Switch to Heirs Insurance Group and our team will do the rest. We guarantee a seamless transition, without double coverage or risk of interruption. Talk to Heirs Why Heirs? Heirs Insurance Group is a digital-first insurer that uses technology to make life insurance simpler, smarter, and more rewarding. Friendly and helpful support when you need it. [email protected] Buy Insurance in Minutes Get covered in minutes using our mobile app, USSD *1100# and other purchase channels Claims paid in 48 hours All validated claims are paid within 48 hours or less. This is our promise to our customers. Branches nationwide We are ready to serve you wherever you are. We have branches across Nigeria serving thousands of customers.
